info.task: navigate backwards to a heading inside a main landmark
info.title: Navigate backwards to a heading inside a main landmark in reading mode

setupScript.name: setFocusAfterMain
setupScript.description: sets focus on a link after the main landmark

user: With the reading cursor on the 'Navigate backwards from here' link, navigate to the 'Main Landmark' heading.
instructions.raw: With the reading cursor on the 'Navigate backwards from here' link, navigate to the 'Main Landmark' heading.
instructions.mode: Insure NVDA is in browse mode by pressing Escape. Note: This command has no effect if NVDA is already in browse mode.

assertions.expectation: Name of the heading, 'Main Landmark', is conveyed
